alert.note: Alert for Northern New London; Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 3:44PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN NEW LONDON COUNTY THROUGH 415 PM EDT... At 343 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Waterford, or over New London, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New London, Groton, Salem, Mystic, Waterford, East Lyme, Ledyard, East Haddam, Old Lyme, Preston, Lyme, Gales Ferry, Ledyard Center, Montville, and North Stonington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern New London; Southern New London
